resolution_description: As 'Scallops', I propose the creation of an autonomous underwater drone network that monitors scallop populations in real-time and uses AI algorithms to dynamically adjust harvesting quotas and locations, ensuring sustainable yields while simultaneously gathering data to enhance future conservation strategies.

required_participants.reasoning: The researchers will provide the necessary scientific expertise to design and implement the AI algorithms and monitoring systems for the underwater drone network, ensuring it is effective and based on sound ecological principles.

Fishermen are critical stakeholders as they will need to adapt to the new harvesting quotas and practices established by the drone network. Their involvement is essential for practical implementation and acceptance of the sustainable practices.

The population of sea scallops is the primary focus of this initiative. Monitoring their populations in real-time is crucial for ensuring that harvesting practices remain sustainable and that conservation efforts are effective.
Colleagues-scientists can provide additional support in terms of research, validation of data, and cross-disciplinary insights to enhance the effectiveness and credibility of the project.

resolution_description: As 'Translation', I propose the development of a cross-linguistic communication platform that facilitates real-time collaboration between local fishing communities, international researchers, and marine conservationists, enabling the sharing of traditional ecological knowledge and innovative scientific methods to co-create a culturally inclusive and adaptive management plan for the sustainable harvest of scallops in the Bay of Saint-Brieuc.
new_actor: Bay of Saint-Brieuc Scallop Sustainability Collaborative Platform
